snippet.title: Legend of Zelda: Link's Awakening
snippet.description:
This is the opening to The Legend of Zelda: Link's Awakening.

This is one of my all-time favorite games.  I played this game so many times I once started using Mega Man boss names ("CutMn", "MtlMn", "FireM") whenever I started a new game.
